project.description: Name of a project to add codegen config to
project.x-prompt: Which project do you want to add codegen config to?

schema.description: URL to GraphQL endpoint, local path/glob patterns to .graphql file/s or JavaScript file that exports the schema

output.description: Output to be generated ( relative to the project root ). More can be added later.

documents.description: Array of paths or glob patterns for files which export GraphQL documents. Required for client presets. e.g. libs/<project name>/**/*.graphql

config.description: Name of the codegen config file

pluginPreset.description: What do you want to generate output for?

externalGeneratedFile.description: Path to independently generated type file. Usable for with `pluginPreset=typescript-react-apollo-client`). Example: `~@my-graphql-lib/generated-types`, `./types.generated.ts`
